sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' const CharacterItem = ({ item }) => { return (

{item.name}

  • House: {item.house}
  • Birthday: {item.dateOfBirth}
  • Ancestry: {item.ancestry}
  • Wand: {item.wand.wood} {item.wand.core} {item.wand.length}
  • Actor: {item.actor}
) } export default CharacterItem
